definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: This robust character, the event will be more powerful.
sentences.chinese: 這樣強韌的個性，遇強則會更強。

sentences.english: All over the human body, the most coriaceous and forceful muscle is tongue.
sentences.chinese: 人類全身上下，最強韌有力的肌肉，是舌頭。

sentences.english: Trees and bones are strong and relatively lightweight.
sentences.chinese: 樹幹和骨骼不僅非常強韌，而且重量相對較輕。

sentences.english: Thetoughening mechanism is discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對其強韌化機制進行了分析討論。

sentences.english: The tighter the weave, the greater the strength of the woven fabric.
sentences.chinese: 編織得愈緊，織就的布料愈強韌。

sentences.english: It has the property of stout, good resistance to damp or water.
sentences.chinese: 它具強韌性和良好的抗水性和防潮性。

sentences.english: Can die already skin, can let labial strong pliable but strong again, not be afraid of gape .
sentences.chinese: 既能去脣上死皮，又能讓嘴脣強韌，不怕打哈欠了。

sentences.english: North Korea showed its toughness through the skirmish.
sentences.chinese: 北韓通過小規模的衝突來顯示自己的強韌。

sentences.english: Mechanically speaking, silk fibers are as tough as steel.
sentences.chinese: 技術上講，絲纖維的強韌度堪比鋼鐵。

sentences.english: Tie them tightly into bundles with strong wire.
sentences.chinese: 用強韌的鐵絲將它們緊緊捆綁成束。

sentences.english: In this paper the toughening mechanism of aluminium alloys after PTMT is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了鋁合金預形熱變處理的強韌化機制。

sentences.english: Hair needs nutrition to be strong and healthy.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮是需要來保證它的強韌和健康。

sentences.english: The intercritical hardening of hypoeutectoid steel takes effect on the strengthening and toughening.
sentences.chinese: 亞共析鋼的亞溫淬火具有強韌化效應。

sentences.english: This process is a new method for raising the strength and ductile of high carbon and alloy die steels.
sentences.chinese: 給出了高碳高合金模具鋼強韌化的一種新方法。

sentences.english: Process of strengthening & toughening and cryogenic treatment of LD steel was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新型模具鋼LD的強韌化及深冷處理工藝。

sentences.english: Avocado moisturizes hair shafts and loads them with protein, making them stronger.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨給發乾增加水分並補充蛋白質，使頭髮更強韌。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to uphold (e.g. justice or virtue)/to promote
